actions.text: Amendment SA 5088 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 258.

Amendment SA 5088 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S10378-10385, S10390-10396, S10398; text: CR S10378) To provide for the protection of United States persons in the implementation of treaty obligations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5088 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5088 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 258.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5088 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 258.

purpose: To provide for the protection of United States persons in the implementation of treaty obligations.
